org.ow2.chameleon.testing.helpers

Class OSGiAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.testing.helpers.OSGiAssert

  • public class OSGiAssert
extends Object
    A set of assertions simplifying OSGi tests.

      • assertBundleState

        public void assertBundleState(String sn,
                              int state)
        Checks whether the bundle with the given symbolic name has the given state. This method fails if the bundle is not deployed.
        Parameters:
        sn - the symbolic name of the bundle
        state - the bundle state

      • assertBundleState

                              String sn,
                              int state)
        Checks whether the bundle with the given symbolic name has the given state. This method fails if the bundle is not deployed.
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        sn - the symbolic name of the bundle
        state - the bundle state
